content.detailedDescription:
The photos were while on a snow mobile trip located on washington mountain in ma.  the person who had taken the pictures only noticed the helicopters but not the ufo. 

i was viewing the trip photos and noticed the ufo's.  my friend at the time, said he was just taking pictures of the military in practice and never noticed anything else.
content.summary: Ufo captured while snowmobiling

content.detailedDescription:
Look, this is not very easy for me. i feel stupid even doing this, and i dont want phone calls or any other crap. i was about 17 years old(i am now 32) and i was with three friends outside of brookston indiana(town of 5000 people in white county) at my parents house. we were all drinking and smoking marijuana, which is part of the reason i never reported this. i knew what people would say. behind my parnets house, is a wide open field for about 200 yards before reaching the town baseball park on the outskirts of brookston. we were just bored kids, walking around and talking, drinking, and having a good time. at one point, two of my friends walked across highway 18 to the cemetary to get some fresh air. my other friend and i decided to watch the night sky while laying in the wide open field, enjoying our buzz and relaxing. all of a sudded, i saw lights behind me(to the west) and at first i thought they were a plane of some kind, or a high flying jet, but i kept listening for engine noise that never came(it is very quiet at night outside my parents house.) the light intensity slowly got brighter, still no noise, when before we knew it, we were both looking at the front tip of the ufo directly above us and floating slowly and silently towared the east. i was terrified. it was so huge and so quiet, it is like a totally contrasting situation to see something so big moving that doesnt make any noise at all. we lied there, both of us frozen with fear and unable to speak. contrary to other sightings i have heard of and read about, the object did not up and zip away into the clouds or off of the horizon. it just continued on its course until it was completely out of sight. never a noise, never a change in course, nothing. just a giant, black, silent triangle flying low and moving slowly over the landscape. i have never been so afraid of anything in my life. ever. i have never seen anything like that since. i am a married man(10 years) i have two kids, a good job, and no history of mental illness, or medications. i havent done any drugs since i was 21 years old, and i would like to consider myself of above average intelligence. i cant bring this up to my family or other friends for fear of ridicule, but this really happend. i wish i could recollect some more details, but that was 15 years ago, and i was a pothead for years after that, so some of those memories are gone. but what i saw that night, is unforgettable, and the only conversation we had about the object was(paraphasing) "did you see that?"  "yes i did" "oh my god, what the hell was that?" "i dont know" we never said anything else about it. when something scares you that much, you dont need to talk about it, you dont need to discuss it, joke about it, tell tall tales about, you are just thankful to god that you saw it, and lived. therefore you dont speak about such things because doing so could bring back those demons. i hope this account in some way helps you guys piece together a flight pattern, or time table, or anything, but there you go. 

rodney.
content.summary: Giant, triangle shaped, silent, very slowly moving, very low flying, lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a farm in rurual hudson township north west of gaylord by about 10 miles. we were specifically there to watch the sky because several neighbors has reported lights in the sky on the preceeding two nights. at around 8:38 pm we were parked on a high knoll on the farm behind the house. we were outside of te car watching the stars begin to appear and identifying constellations when a white orb passed overhead moving roughly the speed of an airplane. we all thought it was a satellite but it was very low to the ground - a real satellite past over 20 minutes later and we knew then that the light we'd seen was not a satellite.  it was a clear night - no clouds - the light was large like landing gear on an airplane but it did not flash - it disappeared abruptly. roughly two minutes later a bright orange light appeared about the treeline roughly 5-7 miles away. the lights were very large even for that distance. at first we thought it was a firework display but there was no bursting of light. this was followed by two bright orange lights and then finally three in a boomerang shape which appeared to turn away from us and go back below the treeline. the objects appeared to come from the ground up each time. once it disappeared for the last time the area became busy with air traffic - three-four planes very high up in the air and at a considerable distance. there are several large private lakes in the area that are rumored to be very deep. because the obects seemed to come up from the ground, we wondered about a uso instead of a true ufo though this was certainly airborne. we all agreed that we were not frightened but rather curious and we knew that it was no any sort of aircraft we had ever seen. the incident two days early was seen by one of the people in our party that night and he was certainly shaken up becuase he was in a cabin in the woods with no electricity when he was awakened at 6 am by a very bright light shining into the cabin's bedroom window. i will not report on this event since i was not privy to it but it was the event that caused us to go back out to the farm two nights later to watch for some sort of event - other people in the neighborhood witnessed the lights as well.
content.summary: Orange lights above the treeline

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 11:30am july 25th, 2005 i was working for a leading apartment magazine and was shooting photos at park view apts. located next to ann morrison park in downtown boise, idaho. i was facing north shooting photos of their pool with the park in the background as part of a photo shoot to be used for their advertising.  i shot several photos of the same general area with my canon power shot 5.0mp using the pop-out video screen to preview my shots.  at no time did i see the object... it must of been moving pretty fast! it did not appear in any other shots but i later found this one photo with the object centered in the photo! i have seen satellites and this is not one. it was not a plane or a bird... it made no noise and was there and gone without bring any attention to itself.
content.summary: Disk shaped object captured in photo over boise, idaho july 25th, 2005.

content.detailedDescription: I just got my motorola android phone and i was playing around in google maps.  at address 2036 w 160th st gardena ca. i was looking at the location and in the sky is a unknown object.  it is not the sun because it is on the other side.  i don't think it's a street light because it's too far away from a pole. anyone with google maps can go to this address and look for themselves and come to their own conclusions.
content.summary: Google maps

content.detailedDescription: I had started my car to let it warm up and upon exiting my vehicle, looked up and saw a single, steady, point of light approximately 65` above and about 10` west of due north, traveling in a linear motion towards the ene at a high rate of speed. it was featureless and soundless, i ruled out the possibility of it being a commercial or civilian aircraft because of it's velocity and the absence any navigation or anti-collision lights. i cannot give an accurate estimate of it's speed or altitude, but as a frequent observer of iss, space shuttle and other satellite flyovers it was easily apparent that the object was covering the sky 2.5 to 3 times faster than any orbiting vehicle i have seen before. the object easily traveled 30` in about 10 to 12 seconds.It slowly faded from view about 45` above the ne horizon.
content.summary: Single point of solid light moving at high velocity.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the drive in with my family when over the top of the screen flew this white sphere like object seeing it i thought it was just a falling star but then it split into two and began to criss cross. (west to east) after seeing this i couldnt watch the movie i just kept looking up at the sky. approximately 30 minutes later another one flew from horizon to horizon.
content.summary: White sphere splits into two and criss crosses

content.detailedDescription:
it was st. patricks day ..My boyfriend and i had been napping on the couch in our living room  enjoying our day off ..When we woke to the sound of a pretty loud (sonic)boom, it really really startled us, then before i could even think or speak an even louder boom, but the loudest i have ever heard in a really long time...It sounded like a bomb right outside  my house, i was telling my boyfriend how that was quite startling,and that sent all of our cats scurrying about the house.
 and then we heard sound of a very loud aircraft, im assuming jets of some sort i didnt go out and look.
i just wanted to report the loud sonic booms,why would an aircraft need to go that fast? over a small town... were they chasing something?
content.summary: 2 loud booms , followed by very very loud jets of some kind.

content.detailedDescription:
Started to sky watching about 8:15pm est . saw alot of commercial traffic along with local aircraft. saw  1st object that appeared as a aircraft about 8:25pm that changed it's lighting pattern while in flight and had no decernable noise moving south to north at a very slow rate.

i grabbed one of my step son friends to come watch and he saw the object hovering and just blinking north from house and then dissappeared.

later we saw several other objects that had the exact same light pattern that fly over with no sound also. flying very slow.

we continued to watch the sky at appox. 9:30pm we saw an object that passed just west of the house moving south to north that looked like two small coffee cups stacked open end on each other. it seemed to be lite up by an external light and had one white blinking light on the upper portion. this visual was made by both of us through binoculars. it traveled at a very slow rate. we watched this for about 5min.

appox. 9:45 we saw an object that was traveling north to south change direction 180 degrees and go back. we watched as it disappeared beyond the houses. 

we returned to house to get warm for a bit, but when when return outside we never saw anything for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Sky watching and saw objects that appeared to be aircraft but  flying to slow

content.detailedDescription: I heard my dogs barking on my back pourch. thinking it was a rat i ran outside and looked in my backyard from my pourch.  i didn't see anything and glanced up and saw a white, dim object slowly moving across the sky. it was northeast from my house. first i thought it was an aircraft but did not strobe white, green, and red.  it seemed very far away and thought it was a satilite but it was not clear last night and my pourch light was on.  suddenly the object seperated into two pieces. one piece going upward and one going down. i was pretty surprised so i ran inside and told my wife and my mother-in-law.  they just took it lightly. unfortunaly i don't have a great camera and i was probably the only witness.  i'm posting this to see if anyone else has seen this same event.
content.summary: Slow moving light breaks into two objects, one goes up, and one goes down.

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing all around arizona in 2009.  we stopped to camp at a secluded place called ashurst lake, where i began taking pictures.  i didn't see these in the sky when i was snapping pictures, but saw them when i brought my camera home to view photos on my computer.  the image is exactly as it was taken, nothing was done to the photograph.
content.summary: Glowing oddities in flight.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to gilbert from the superstition springs mall with my mom and my daughter at about 7:30 p.M. on baseline rd. we looked up and saw a string of evenly spaced lights that looked identical to what i had seen in news stories of the famous "phoenix lights" sighting in 1997. there were three evenly spaced white lights in an arc relatively near the horizon that did not appear to move. there were other lights that extended the arc higher into the sky but they seemed to shift into a "v" or "diamond" shape. there were also other aircraft lights in the sky that were clearly planes or helicopters moving around, perhaps observing the phenomenon. i am not sure if the shifting "v" or "diamond" was part of the phenomena or was composed of aircraft observing the phenomena. we observed the lights for about 15 minutes as we drove east on baseline before stopping at the safeway on higley and baseline. the lights were still in the sky when we went into the store but were gone when we exited the store no more than 20 minutes later. the pattern of evenly spaced lights was remarkable enough for us to notice and comment. my ten year old daughter immediately connected the lights to the "phoenix lights" sighting video she had seen on tv months earlier - the similarity was very strong. my mother did not know anything about the 1997 sighting but immediately recognized that it was unusual.
content.summary: Arc of evenly spaced lights observed in night sky while driving east on baseline road from superstition springs to gilbert.

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for breakfast at denny's and i was looking out the window.
i noticed a round silvery object and thought it was a large mylar ballon. then it dawned on me it was not streight up like a ballon but on it's side.
then i realized it didn't have a tail (like a kite would have) or a string
attached.  it went slowly straight up and when it got about 30-40 feet,then 2 others poped up and stopped below the first one.  we have alot of winds up here and the first one was stable all this time.  of the two,
the one on the right took off like a bat out of hell and the one one the
left slowly drifted off.  now the first one slowly drifted over denny's.
they all went in 3 differnt directions and 3 different speeds. i didn't say
anything to anyone because the dinner was full of old people and i know
they wouldn't see anything.  i was a caregiver and i know the elderly.  and
this is not my first sighting but my most recent.  thank you for letting me
tell my story.  they have been here.
content.summary: 3 round shiny silver/red objects poped out of grove of tree's

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette while looking up at all the stars in the sky. every once in awhile i see starlike objects in the sky moving around and will watch their flight paths to determine if it is satellite or something else. i have seen a few that fly straight and dim out in the distance and i have seen a few that have erratic movements. but what i saw tonight, i have no idea what it could of been. i was looking straight up in the sky and all of a sudden a there was a quick flash of light from nowhere. almost like a camera flash taken from the sky. then about a second later another flash just like the first happened about a foot away from the first from my perspective. these flashes were not near any stars and just came out of nowhere. i did not hear any sound or see any type of craft at all. this was very strange due to the fact that nothing was near these flashes. it almost made me feel like they were communicating to each other and i wished i had night vision goggles to see if something was there. i doubt it was seen by anyone else since it happened so quick, but it was strange. i have seen a few unexplained objects the last few years including an extremely close up sighting of a triangle ufo.
content.summary: Two different flashes in sky at close proximity to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone for a walk from the city of duarte (where i lived at the time, http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/duarte,_california) across the san gabriel river (http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/san_gabriel_river_(california)) into the city of azusa (http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/duarte,_california).  on my return, as i neared the san gabriel river bicycle path (http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/san_gabriel_river_bicycle_path) from the east, i heard and then saw five helicopters approaching from the southwest, flying in a slight and loose "v" formation.  i stopped at the tree line that existed then in order to avoid being spotted; i don't remember my exact position, but i think it was about 34.14775 latitude, -117.925375  longitude.  i don't remember the exact time, but i think it was between 9:30 pm and 10:00 pm pst.  i presumed that they were u.S. forest service helicopters, which almost regularly swept the san gabriel river from the santa fe dam recreation area (http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/santa_fe_dam_recreation_area) to the top of the river's alluvial fan at night (and maybe still continue to do so).  i immediately noticed that the helicopters were approaching an intensely bright ball of light about 15 to 20 feet in diameter; i didn't discern a structure or physical surface within it, but i immediately assumed that it was an alien spacecraft nonetheless.  each helicopter had a "headlight", and all of them activated at about this same time.  the ball of light easily outshone the headlights.  being as bright as it was, i wondered how the ball had gotten to that position without me noticing it.  the middle helicopter slowed to a stationary hover in "front" of the ball, while the other four flanked either side of it and rotated to face it.  the helicopter personnel used the helicopters' public address systems to demand of the ball that it identify itself; this went on for a few minutes, but the ball did not respond to any of the demands.  then the helicopter personnel verbally inquired of each other how they should continue to handle this event; after a moment or so of discussion, the ball shot straight up out of sight in less than two seconds -- maybe in less then one second.  it did not appear to accelerate gradually from motionlessness to a high speed, but instead seemed to immediately begin travelling at a high speed and maintain that same speed until it was out of view.  the helicopter personnel expressed their amazement at what they witnessed, then mutually agreed that they would not report the event to anyone.  the helicopters resumed their previous travel northeast along the san gabriel river.  i had remained more or less motionless for the duration of the event.  i spent a minute or two getting over my own amazement, then crossed the river and returned home.  i remember that i arrived at home sometime between 10:00 pm and 10:30 pm pst.

i described this event to my father soon after i returned home, and he seemed to believe it.  (when i was younger, he had told me of a ufo that he and his brothers encountered when they were young.)

over the years, i've told the story to a few other relatives and a few friends.  i've been aware of mufon since i was a teenager in the 1980s, but i never thought of telling my story to it.  i described the aforementioned event to another relative earlier today, and he talked me into submitting it to mufon.
content.summary: Silent motionless ball of bright light encountered by helicopters, then it sped upward out of sight in an instant

content.detailedDescription:
At 4pm on march 17th (st. patrick's day) driving south on grand view ave at the intersection of venice blvd 1 block north of centinella i saw an object that looked to be hovering about 1-2000 feet over the lax area of the city.

it was rather large long and wide kind of like the side of a long and very thick blim (not exactly, it appeared dark metallic) i put it in the approximate area of hovering over lax whic is obviously restricted air space. so no blimp would be in the space. plus it hovered didn't move for at least 2 mins.

pulled over and watched it for about 2 minutes. snapped a pic on my cell but can't really make it out on the pic.


quickly got back in the car and drove 3-4 blocks south to see if i get a closer look and when i parked, got out and looked in the area n the sky i saw it before (4-5 mins prior)  it was gone.

on the pic below i think it's the dot right over the top of the light post across the street.

anyone else see or report anything that day in that general vicinity?
content.summary: Something hovering over lax

content.detailedDescription:
In car daydreaming out window when small white light in sky caught my attention....I took pictures of the object as it stayed in the same place for about a minute. it was a cloudy day so object was below cloud limit.

link to ufo video!

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=q70upgiyosw
content.summary: Ufo footage in day light!!

content.detailedDescription:
Watching for satellites on back patio, seen a bright light coming from the n/w to s/e direction no sound from a motor or jet engine very smooth and on course direction, somewhat appearing to decend, suddenly levels off and starts a zig zaging course approximately six zig zags and now it's accending towards the n/e but it should'nt be going out of sight because its well within our atmosphere but it does, what was a brite noticeable light is quickly getting smaller and disappears. and then the blue flash and it gone. it's intriguing nothing to be scare of, i've been watching this activity since the late sixties, and i know what everyone assumes.
but i just write them off as narrowminded people who would never believe it anyway.I feel very blessed to have wittnessed so many sighting from maine to california. i don't know how to put sketches or audios on the computer i'm not that savvey.I never report my sighting to authorities simply because they're idiots and not worth my time, but mufon strikes me as being sincere.
content.summary: Light coming from n/w no wing or tail lights smooth gliding zig zag disaapeared blue flash.

content.detailedDescription: Looked into southwestern sky below stars definately in atmosphere with naked eye saw a twinkleling litght that looked different than a star.  only had a pair of binoculars available but through tem could see the saturn shaped saucer turning slowly clockwise moving around very slowly.  i compared the object to other stars and planets in the night sky and looked like no other.  i have always believed in ufo,s but now am far more excited about looking for them.I watche the object until it sloly became smaller and smaller heading southward at about same elevation till i could no longer see it with my binoculars
content.summary: Constant color changing saturn shape disc

content.detailedDescription:
i got a phone call from a friend of mine.
she told me somebody was at my house in town.
 my house in town is empty,
me and my wife got into my car and went to my house in town to see who was there.
when we got there nobody was there.
then we call my friend on my celler phone and told her nobody was there,
my wife talked to her on my phone all the way home.
after we got home my wife stay in the car and talk to my friend.
i got out and started walking toward my front door, as i was walking, i looked up i could see a white light that looks like a star moving my direction.
 the object was moving east.
  i reach to my side to get my camera it was not there i forgot that i took it off.
i ran into the house to get my camera i forgot where i layed it.
i told jimmy there is a ufo outside.
 jimmy went outside with me i show him where it was.
 he keep watching it.
 while i went to my truck to find my camera.
while i was in my truck looking for my camera.  
jimmy told me that it faded out it never flew over us.
 if it was a plane you could see lights blinking there was no blinking lights at all  and no sound
content.summary: A white light flew in my  direction and  my son saw it fade out while i was looking for my camera

content.detailedDescription:
on the evening of march 15, 2010 i was driving home from vernal, ut with my wife and son in our car.  at about 7:30 pm, local time, a huge bright amber colored light just popped out of nowhere in front of us.  it was about 3 miles from me, and about 35 degrees up in the sky in the western sky.  i noticed it because it was obviously the only light in the sky at the time.  absolutely no stars, planets, planes, or any other sort of light.  i have seen this exact light in the sky before, at least six times this year already!  i felt as if it really wanted us to see it.  i proceeded to finish driving home.  as i was continuing my drive, it moved with me to about 10 degrees above the western horizon.  i detail on the attached movies exactly what we are looking at and where we are looking at.  when we got back to my home, i grabbed my camera out of my jeep and started filming.  the object stayed in view for about 30 minutes total.  my witness to this is my wife, ********, and the footage i have provided.  ************** both of roosevelt,ut.  after filming for about 10 minutes, the object slowly flew north toward the uintah mountain range.  it didn't fly off or zoom off, it just kind of faded out of view.  the very next day at about 6:30 pm, n unmarked blackhawk helicopter flew right over my head and went in the exact same direction as the ufo.  i even have footage of the helicopter taking pictures of me and my family.  in all of the times i and my wife have seen this object, we never ever felt any fear.  this thing seems just to want us to know it is there, watching us.  this is a very active spot for ufo sightings.  roosevelt is home of the infamous ufo ranch as well.  i would just like to know what exactly this thing is.  is it man made?  is it a natural phenomenon?  is it extra-terrestrial?  any answers you may gather from viewing this would be very helpful to me.  

thank you for your consideration on this matter.


sincerely, 

***********

ps  to whom it may concern:  i have photos and more video of this object.  there are only three places for me to upload video files of the object.   thank you
content.summary: Driving home with my wife and son and filmed a ufo over roosevelt ut

content.detailedDescription:
We had heard about the recent sitings of a ufo hovering above lake erie near euclid, oh, so we went and found a spot on a side street that looked over the lake near some apartments.  we then saw what everyone was talking about.  i never fully believed in ufo's until i saw this with my own eyes!  it was mostly an amber-color but shifted to redish colors and sometimes more of a whitish colour.  it would zig-zag sometimes, it would be stationary at others, and it would rapidly move all over the place at other times.  it was not an airplane as it would move right and then left and then up and down with no rhyme or reason.  it would fade in and out and change colors and intensity.  

when i first noticed it i thought it could be a plane so i watched it for a few minutes to determine whether it could have been a plane or helicopter.  after a few minutes it started its zigzagging so i deduced that it was not a plane. i considered a star or planet but it was all over the place.  

i had no particular strong feelings other than thinking to myself wow i actually saw a ufo.  i don't know if it's aliens or not, it's just unidentified and curious.  

i listen to coast to coast am all the time so i am familiar with the concepts of ufo's and what people can mistake them for.  

it got cold so we decided to go home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Zig-zagging color-chhanging light over lake erie

content.detailedDescription: Third time ive seen this in last year . moving from nw to se . i went out with my dogs , i was looking up in the sky and i was watching an object high in the sky moving from se when the bright object showed up in my right perif.
content.summary: Bright, slow moving , no soun

content.detailedDescription:
July 22, 2008

dear sir:

   i have been a little hesitant to report a sighting two friends and i had some time back.       this sighting took place on thursday night september 27, 2001.   i might also add that one of the friends with me was an active fbi agent and also the driver of the vehicle.
   we were coming out of richmond, virginia at 11:00 pm on the above date when we approached exit 58 on the southbound side of interstate 95. on one side to the west is state route 150 with high tension electrical lines on the east running parallel to i-95 and (under construction at the time) to the west is  interstate 895 overpass. 
   we sighted a very odd flying object going from west to east. what was strange about this is that the object had come in under the electrical lines and was lit up in very bright white lights. the shape was that of a sailors cap. this object couldnt have been 75 feet overhead. the vehicle was maybe 25 feet square and10-12 feet tall. we had                                                          pulled onto the side of the road to watch this spectacle which had also attracted the attention of several vehicles on the northbound side of i-95. 
   the object hovered over the roadways columns for a few minutes and then very slowly headed east with absolutely no sound. we had a clear view for probably 8-10 minutes.
   i have seen pictures of lots of different shapes of ufos, but i have never seen or heard of anything like this. do you have any ideas? we didnt have a camera or video camera to take pictures of this. all three of us have discussed this several times and agree to what we saw. all three of us are over 50 were not hallucinating, on drugs, or drinking, just normal family men.
content.summary: Ufo alongside interstate 95

content.detailedDescription: my buddy and i were driving i was in passenger seat he was driving we were west bound on johnson ferry rd west of bridge and of evergreen rd  on the hill looking south west for at least 1 minute at object. object about 2 miles away. looked like a smile like the moon but it was facing the wrong way to be the moon. the object was still and motionless. it was like a golden orange smile low on the south west horizon. clear night could see the complete sky with stars. we lost it in the treeline then could not find it again. we tried to look for it after we saw it drove up to hospital and all high points in area to try to find it could not find object after initial sighting on johnson ferry rd incedent lasted about 15 minutes in total from initail sighting to end of search. it was kinda cool and exciting at first but then i got a little nervous then was fine after a while it was also disaponting we could not get close. i have seen a ufo up close before and reported it.
content.summary: Moon like object like smile golden orange low on horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Early  in the morning,  my grandmother was taking me to the school bus stop.  we had to walk a way as we lived in the country.  there were no neighbors near us.  our walk was about 3/4 mile  to the bus stop.  there was no one else around.  nana and i always  watched the sky for odd things.   we lived near the  allentown-bethlehem-easton airport.  often times we would see  "fun" things like the blimp.  this day was different.  today there was a big thing in the sky.   it was very, very
high in the sky.  the  mares tail cirus clouds were floating in front of it.  any how, this thing looked like a big community with sets of stairs or some type of tracks keeping things moving back and forth.  there was smalll silver objects going back and forth.  my grandmother said it was something that the russians were doing to keep us safe.  this was in the sky numerous days.   it made me feel very uneasy to just look at it.  
i had to stop looking for it.  it  just made me feel very nervous.  it also was in the same location in the sky.
content.summary: Ufo   base  in  the   sky"

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the porch of my house looking at the stars, thinking about the triangle craft i had seen earlier that morning, when i noticed a dark shape blocking out the light from stars etc. and i noticed the slightly glowing circle shaped things on bottom, it was barely noticeable, but could be seen. it moved very quickly toward me, moving from south-west  to north-east then passing over the power plant.Then out of sight
content.summary: Saw a dark shaped outline in the night sky with no lights no sound! but  2 dim glowing exhaust?

content.detailedDescription:
My friend greg gomez and i were outside the southhall dorms at the university of new orleans at 4:15 pm. i began skateboarding on the sidewalk while greg made a call. i then had the thought to scan the skies for a ufo. (i often scan the sky for anomalies so that i might increase the chances of actually seeing one.) well, i got what i was looking for. as soon as i looked up, i saw what looked like a black circle floating in the sky. the object immediately caught my attention because of it's foreign appearance. the circular object was approximately half the size of a dime from my perspective and made no noise. i gazed at the object for a few seconds wondering what this object could be before i called out to greg. after hanging up, greg stood beside me and said "what is that?" the object then began moving down and to the right in an erratic motion. the flying object then moved in front of a cloud. this is where things really get strange. at this point, i thought the black on white contrast would give me a more defined visual of the object. however, the object seemed to be changing in shape. i felt as if my brain had a hard time grasping the true shape of the object. the object seemed to flatten out into an elliptical shape and even split in two at times, then coalesced in less than a second. once the flying object moved past the cloud, it dissipated. since it was st. patrick's day, we thought that this object could have been a huge balloon, but that doesn't really make sense if you consider that it moved down, changed shape, and then disappeared. 

i am attaching two photos of ufos similar to what we saw that i found on the internet.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black circular ufo seen over new orleans

content.detailedDescription: At dawn on this morning of march the 17th, i was on way home when i saw a triangle shaped  craft coming toward me, i pulled over to try to take a picture of it, it was moving quickly so i failed, i then proceeded to follow it toward highway 29/35 area of logansport it was going in a  slightly north to  southeast direction. was weird its lights where uniformly triangular, then all  the sudden it changed from solid lights to very fast moving strobing all over lights.. i dont know what that means , it was low enough that when i pulled over and stuck my head out the window to see it, i should have heard it had it been a normal aircraft?
content.summary: At dawn, saw low flying bright lights, triangle craft strobing light on front

content.detailedDescription: Around 2am, me and 3 other friends decided to go star gazing on top of a mountain in banner elk, nc. it was exceptionally clear. we took 2 cars, 2 of my friends were in another car. they drove to the spot before me and my other friend arrived. i got a text from them around 2am saying they saw a ufo. we quickly got to them, but they said it disappeared. they said it stayed hovered (in the distance) above the skyline and quickly disappeared. i was curious so i looked everywhere i could to find something similar to what they described. they described it as red, green and white flashes of light. all of a sudden, on my right hand side, i noticed something flashing, much brighter than all the other stars. it also flashed red, green, and white light. it stayed stationary for approximately 20 minutes before going in a pattern. the pattern was this: up, down, diagonally left, and then diagonally back to it's original spot. we then noticed 2 more, side by side, close to the star betelgeuse following the same pattern of movement and had the same flashing lights. eventually the original one i spotted began to drop, slowly, below the mountain, and then bobbed up and down, still visible. it then disappeared. the other two began to get more faint like they were farther away. then to the far left of me, one much closer appeared out of no where, also with the same pattern and colors. then out of nowhere it disappeared. the only two that were left were the two closest to betelgeuse. we sat and watched until approximately 4:30am. the two did not disappear. we left so i do not know what happened with those last two. i almost cried out of excitement, i never in my life thought i would experience something like this. i'm going back tonight with one of the friends who joined me last night, and another person who did not see them last night. we're going at the same time as last night. also, i was going to call a dispatcher to see if anyone else had reported seeing it. my gps has been dead for a while so i couldn't get the point in the sky the original object was so my friend used her iphone to see which direction in the sky it was, it started to work, and then stopped working all together.
content.summary: Red, green flashes, multiple ufos for approximately 3 1/2 hours.
